Articles.Content:
DISCLAIMER: I assume this is ok with the "don't discuss mature content" rule. I don't plan to discuss any of the controversial aspects of the game.

Right. GTA IV. Mods.

I have quite a few installed. I would like recommendations, especially of ones which add GTA V content.

I'm getting a bit bored doing the same chaotic stuff/playing LCPDFR. If you know any mods which are fun, please post them below!

No replies? Is this just a quiet sub-forum or do too few people play GTA?

EDIT: still nothing? I'll leave it until tomorrow

Edited June 12, 2014 by Javster
Hmm, I would recommend any sort of mod that adds more cars and make the bigger and funner to drive around in.

Hmm, I would recommend any sort of mod that adds more cars and make the bigger and funner to drive around in.

The problem is that they usually have to replace another car...
Since almost no one has replied maybe this thread should be locked?
